Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Good food and ay a pretty good price. The Junkyard Dog was really good! It has a sausage wrapped in cheese then meat, laid on bacon, and covered with sauerkraut and sause. Really good and very filling. My wife had the cheeseburger and said that it was very good as well. The meat was not over cooked and the vegetables were tasty.

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: foodcrib is a outdoor food stand at Museumplein where you can buy burgers, hotdogs, salads, ice-creams and other fast foods at reasonable prices. There is a covered outdoor seating area or you can take your orders to go. ‚Ä¶

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: This place is amazing! The energy is just so refreshing and the owners are down to earth and treat everyone like an old friend.  We couldn't stay away from this place! We were probably the most demanding (read annoying) customers of the day ‚Ä¶

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: I‚Äôve ordered ‚Äúchubby hotdog‚Äù, it‚Äôs the best hotdog i ever had before. The bread is crispy outside, soft and sticky inside. Sausage is perfect. The combination of bread sausage cheese and bacon is well balance and i love the fries onion very much.

Name: Food Crib
Review Text:
Perfect for getting a quick lunch after the Rijksmuseum.
The vegan hemp burger was amazing, definitely recommended. The line went reasonably fast despite being sort of long, and the staff all seemed pleasant. Free crispy opinions as well, which were a good addition to the hemp burger! :-)

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: had the veggie burger, but it was disappointing - the bread was too tough, and the guacamole overpowered the flavour of the beetroot patty. The hot chocolate was quite good tho! One good point of this shop is it‚Äôs very convenient location, right in between Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Nice place! The staff was nice! I ordered a basic hotdog, the bread was tasty but also the sausage! You can eat for cheap!

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Food well taken care of. Good sausages, great bread. Staff friendly. Prices ok for such good products, way better than the average hot dog you get around the corner

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: my partner and I stopped here very quickly before going an event in Amsterdam. He had a hotdog which was great but I went for the boring option of a tuna and cheese melt and omg. It was amazing. The bread was so yummy and it was HUGE!! I ‚Ä¶

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Their claim to fame, The Junkyard Dog, was a party in my stomach!  There are a vast array of burgers, dogs, brats, and refreshments.   It gets the job done when you've been touring museums all morning and looking for a quick bite.

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: I'd recommend this food cart outside the rijksmuseum. I had a hemp vegan burger and it was delicious. They have free sauerkraut  and crispy onions and a short waiting time. There's also seating overlooking the museum square.

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Very good food. Awesome service. Fast and delicious.

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Best street food in long time. Bread is warm and crispy,  food is just right!

Name: Food Crib
Review Text: Great street hotdogs and burgers. Had chubby and recommend it

Name: Food Crib
